channel.title: [Tool]Proxy[Tool]
channel.description:
I found this proxy useful to use when your Server gets spammed and you get their Server IP all you do is download it and activate it and it puts you on the proxy. if you get ip baned just deactivate it and re-activate it because it will give you a diff ip
don't use this to hack peoples server, or spam them. only use it when you NEED to
Download: http://www.anchorfree.com/
- - - Pictures - - -
A ScreenShot of the WebSite you Download From.
[IMG]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/stewie0888/site.png[/img]
This is the Proxy Activating VIA Browser
[IMG]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/stewie0888/activate.png[/img]
This is the menu located near your computer clock used to turn on/off
[IMG]http://i594.photobucket.com/albums/tt26/stewie0888/view-1.png[/img]
Credits to Anchorfree and Hotspot Shield for Creating it.

item.title: [Tool]Proxy[Tool]
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

It changes your IP to protect you against “hackers” who think they can do things with it. Also you can change it by turning off then on to get back into a Server. Getting pictures now.

Please note that while installing your virus protection may prompt for false positives. you can google the website and the software its verified.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 29, 2009, 12:21:10 am[/size][hr]Ok I added the pictures and put a little more explanations on it

Read full topic
